member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION
member.summary: The TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION structure is used to retrieve authentication information for a trusted domain. The function uses this structure when its InformationClass parameter is set to TrustedDomainAuthInformation.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION.IncomingAuthInfos
member.summary: Specifies the number of entries in the IncomingAuthenticationInformation and IncomingPreviousAuthenticationInformation arrays.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION.IncomingAuthenticationInformation
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures containing the authentication information for the incoming side of a trust relationship.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION.IncomingPreviousAuthenticationInformation
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures containing the previous authentication information (or old password) for the incoming side of a trust relationship. There must be one of these for every entry in the IncomingAuthenticationInformation array.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION.OutgoingAuthInfos
member.summary: Specifies the number of entries in the OutgoingAuthenticationInformation and OutgoingPreviousAuthenticationInformation arrays.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION.OutgoingAuthenticationInformation
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures containing the authentication information for the outgoing side of a trust relationship.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_AUTH_INFORMATION.OutgoingPreviousAuthenticationInformation
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures containing the previous authentication information (or old password) for the outgoing side of a trust relationship. There must be one of these for every entry in the OutgoingAuthenticationInformation array.
